text: Aminul Islam (1 January 1935 â€“ 29 November 2017) was a Bangladeshi academic. He was the president of Bangladesh Academy of Sciences. He was a fellow of the academy since 1978. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Bangladeshi academics Category:Recipients of the Independence Day Award Category:People from Chittagong Division
